DOC.brief_summary: Cystic fibrosis ( CF ) chronic hereditary respiratory disease . Exercise test part CF patient regular assessment . Cardio-Pulmonary Exercise Testing ( CPET ) currently consider gold standard ass physical capacity . However , simple field test emerge . These test easier perform especially population CF child adolescent . The 1minute Sit-To-Stand test recently evaluate CF adult . This test correlate maximal oxygen consumption CPET . The investigator hypothesize test also correlate 6-Minute Walking distance ( 6-min Walk Test ) , quadriceps strength , respiratory muscle strength health-related quality life .
